attributes.action: reclaim all profits from the sale and renovation of MPs second homes for the taxpayer, for the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Profits on second homes where mortgages and renovations have been paid for by the taxpayer should be repaid to the public purse.

All such funds, and profits made from such funds, rightfully belong to the taxpayer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
